TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageMargins extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is c:pageMargins.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **pageMargins (Page Margins)** This element specifies the page margins for a chart. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |printSettings (§21.2.2.148)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |b (Bottom)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the bottom page margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| |footer (Footer)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the footer margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| |header (Header)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the header margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| |l (Left)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the left page margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| |r (Right)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the right page margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| |t (Top)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain the top page margin in inches.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_PageMargins) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PageMargins class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Bottom : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.DoubleValue with get, set

summary.para: Represents the following attribute in the schema: b

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies the contents of this attribute will contain the bottom page margin in inches.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `double` datatype.
